Mode.Description: This mode boosts sample into the flow cell under full vacuum prior to starting sheath flow.

TimeSegment.Description: Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).
Wait for Tube to be loaded
Wait for SITD, move to High slider position.
Pre-Run at high flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).
Run at high flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).

Mode.Description: This mode boosts sample into the flow cell under full vacuum prior to starting sheath flow.

TimeSegment.Description: Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).
Wait for Tube to be loaded
Wait for SITD, move to Medium slider position.
Pre-Run at Medium flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).
Run at medium flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).

Mode.Description: This mode boosts sample into the flow cell under full vacuum prior to starting sheath flow.

TimeSegment.Description: Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).
Wait for Tube to be loaded
Wait for SITD, move to LOW slider position.
Pre-Run at LOW flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).
Run at low flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2).

Mode.Description: This mode starts sheath and sample flow into the flow cell. Sample is running at High flow rate.

TimeSegment.Description: Run at high flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2)

Mode.Description: This mode starts sheath and sample flow into the flow cell. Sample is running at Medium flow rate.

TimeSegment.Description: Run at medium flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2)

Mode.Description: This mode starts sheath and sample flow into the flow cell. Sample is running at Low flow rate.

TimeSegment.Description: Run at low flow rate-open valves V1, V3, and V7(P2)

Mode.Description: This mode flushes the sheath and sample paths with the fluid in the sheath tank.

TimeSegment.Description: Flush fluid through the main sheath path
Flush fluid through the main sheath path
Flush Sheath Through sheath and the waste paths
Flush Sheath Through sheath and the waste paths
Flush fluid through the filter vent path

Mode.Description: This mode stops all flow.
This mode draws cleanser from a vessel placed under the SIT into the flow cell.

TimeSegment.Description: Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.
Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.
Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.

Mode.Description: This mode backflushes the sample injection tube and rinses the flow cell.

TimeSegment.Description: Wait for SITU, open valve V1, and put linear valve into FSH position.
Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).

Mode.Description: This mode backflushes the sample injection tube and rinses the flow cell twice.

TimeSegment.Description: Wait for SITU, open valve V1, and put linear valve into FSH position.
Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).
Wait for SITU, open valve V1, and put linear valve into FSH position.
Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).

Mode.Description: This mode drains the flow cell.
This mode fills the flow cell.

TimeSegment.Description: Refill drain line with sheath fluid.

Mode.Description: This mode removes air bubbles from the sheath filter and sheath lines.

TimeSegment.Description: Purge the filter through the vent port.
Open valve 1, 2, 3, and 7 and flush fluid through Flow Cell.
Open valve 1, 3, and 7 and flush fluid through Flow Cell.

Mode.Description: This mode flushes sheath through valves repeatedly.

TimeSegment.Description: Open valve 1 and 3 and flush fluid through.
Open valves 4, 5, and 6 and flush fluid through.
Open valve 1 and 3 and flush fluid through.
Open valves 4, 5, and 6 and flush fluid through.
Open valve 1 and 3 and flush fluid through.
Open valves 4, 5, and 6 and flush fluid through.
Open valve 1 and 3 and flush fluid through.
Open valves 4, 5, and 6 and flush fluid through.
Open valve 1 and 3 and flush fluid through.
Open valves 4, 5, and 6 and flush fluid through.

Mode.Description: This mode boosts sample into the flow cell under full vacuum prior to starting sheath flow.

TimeSegment.Description: Wait for SITP, move to Mix slider position.
Aspirate sample and allow tubing to relax

Mode.Description: This mode boosts sample into the flow cell under full vacuum prior to starting sheath flow.

TimeSegment.Description: Wait for SITP, move to FSH slider position.

Mode.Description: This mode draws cleanser from a vessel placed under the SIT into the flow cell and leaves SIT down.

TimeSegment.Description: Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.
Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.
Boost cleanser into flow cell at high volume.

Mode.Description: The mode stops all flow.
This aspirate remaining droplets.

TimeSegment.Description: Release pressure in flow cell through V1 and V7(P2).
